publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1525 Mr Brian Monteith: All Saints Roman Catholic Secondary School, Glasgow-That the Parliament congratulates All Saints Roman Catholic Secondary School in Glasgow on the successful implementation of its streaming policy which it has concluded has led to an improvement in attainment, discipline and application by pupils at the school and urges other schools to consider the benefits of streaming as a means of improving attainment. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Margaret Mitchell*

S2M-1525 Mr Brian Monteith: All Saints Roman Catholic Secondary School, Glasgow-That the Parliament congratulates All Saints Roman Catholic Secondary School in Glasgow on the successful implementation of its streaming policy which it has concluded has led to an improvement in attainment, discipline and application by pupils at the school and urges other schools to consider the benefits of streaming as a means of improving attainment. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank, Alex Johnstone, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Margaret Mitchell
